originalText.text: I've worked with James Ruff multiple times over nearly twenty years for my housing needs in NYC. He's an amazing listing agent, and an incredible buyer's agent. Through his advice I've successfully obtained multiple properties, and been able to help my mother find a great home way below market price. Years ago I remember when James convinced me to sign on a property in what was literally an unknown area of NYC on the west side of Manhattan. "Trust me, this is a great deal and you would be a fool to pass it up", he said. This decision would turn out to be an amazing housing decision, in what would later become The Hudson Yards. James guided me through my anxiety and fear and let me know that I was making the correct decision in choosing my first home in New York. This was some of the most sound advice I received in my early adult life, which set me up for future success. Manhattan real estate is unbelievably competitive and having someone who knows the market, knows how to negotiate, and always looks after your interest first is wildly valuable. You can trust in James and his company The James Ruff Group to take care of you like family. Mr. Ruff is a great NY agent, and runs an amazing real estate firm.

originalText.text: If you need help finding the home of your dreams in New York, and appreciates thorough research and negotiation skills from someone knowledgeable and dedicated - You will be completely satisfied with James Ruff and his team as your real estate agent and local realtor. James is a local specialist in both NYC & Southern FL real estate, and is also licensed in Massachusetts! With expertise in Manhattan & Brooklyn, he understands the home sale process and how to win in negotiations in New York for his clients. NYC real estate is challenging to navigate and near impossible without a great team as we all know how hard it is to manage moving and an apartment sale in New York City with all the marketing required to cut through the competition and find the right buyer! I recommend James to my friends and any client that is very particular but doesn't have the time to do the research themselves while making sure they get top-dollar returns on their investment. Need a local lender, contractor, expediter, attorney, etc? These guys have great people you can trust! James will work for you just as passionately as he would for his own family. He is a great listener, knows the New York and Southern Florida markets well, and is an expert with laws/regulations that may affect your options. You can trust in James' expertise and his team to manage the complexities of selling your home in New York while securing you a new property out of state to call your own, or if you are relocating from out of state to New York City and need to leverage someone with deep local knowledge.

originalText.text: I have known James for nearly a decade and he's consistently been a solid, honest, supportive and loyal friend. He applies these same qualities to his relationships with his clients, and is well-versed and highly competent in the NY real estate market. If you're looking for a broker who genuinely cares and wants to help you find (or sell) your perfect home, look no further than James Ruff Group. His personal touch will ensure your (often stressful) home-buying/selling experience flows as smoothly and easily as possible. You won't regret your decision.

originalText.text: I've known James for close to 20 years and he is an exceptional human being who is dependable, sincere and incredibly knowledgeable about the real estate market. I am a fan of his approach because you get someone who truly listens to your needs and connects with you to give you the best options for you or your family. In a business where most are focused on the bottom line, James is focused on helping you find a place to call home for the long term. His expertise in NY & Fl also gives him an advantage if you are looking in these cities. He is the only choice I would choose to help me find a forever home.

originalText.text: James is amazing in every way to work with. He is kind, yet direct, knowledgable, and giving. He has helped me with several property transactions over the last five years, three in New York, one in Boca Raton, and we are currently working on another near Miami. His ability to manage projects and people is impressive and he has been able to negotiate awesome opportunities for me multiple times. One thing that I feel is impressive is that he always checks in and follows-up even after the deals are done making sure that I am happy and that we have everything we need. Excellent broker with a great team!
